definition: to calculate/to compute/to count/to regard as important/to plan/ruse/meter/gauge
to count/to count as/to regard as/to enumerate (sb's shortcomings)
according to/to act in accordance with/to depend on/to seize/to occupy

sentences.english: Designs and coordinates a wide variety of accounting and statistical data and reports .
sentences.chinese: 设计和协调丰富的会计和统计数据及报告。

sentences.english: But the OECD figure is quite different to the official Chinese figures.
sentences.chinese: 但是经合组织的数字与中国官方的统计数据迥异。

sentences.english: The Musas’ deaths, he predicted, would become just another statistic.
sentences.chinese: 他推测，穆萨父女之死只不过是又一统计数据罢了。

sentences.english: These are the indicators of crisis, subject to data and statistics.
sentences.chinese: 这些都是得自材料和统计数据的危机指标。

sentences.english: You can display these statistics graphically through the user interface described below.
sentences.chinese: 可以通过下面描述的图形用户界面显示这些统计数据。

sentences.english: After the drama of visiting John, I decided to treat myself to a well-deserved stats check.
sentences.chinese: 在见完约翰以后，我决定好好地检查下统计数据。

sentences.english: Congressional seats are reapportioned on the basis of census data.
sentences.chinese: 统计数据来支持他的论点。

sentences.english: How do I display virtual memory statistics?
sentences.chinese: 如何显示虚拟内存统计数据？

sentences.english: Bit.ly also offers users all kinds of statistics.
sentences.chinese: 此外还提供各种统计数据。

sentences.english: Of course it could be that the wordnik stats feature has a kink in it.
sentences.chinese: 当然不排除wordnik的统计数据有误的可能。

sentences.english: Usually, they are the result of statistical legerdemain.
sentences.chinese: 而且他们往往是通过在统计数据方面玩弄把戏产生的。

sentences.english: But deciding to relocate based on statistics is not advisable.
sentences.chinese: 但是根据这些统计数据去搬迁并非明智之举。

sentences.english: The SSB figures are based on customs declarations on defense exports.
sentences.chinese: 挪威统计局的统计数据主要基于国防出口的海关申报。

sentences.english: The following table shows some of our results from monitoring the caching statistics.
sentences.chinese: 下面的表显示了监控缓存统计数据得出的一些结果。

sentences.english: Statistics gathered by AWR are queried from memory.
sentences.chinese: 通过AWR的统计数据来自于内存。

sentences.english: The quality of statistical data influences the science of Macroeconomic policy-making.
sentences.chinese: 统计数据质量事关宏观社会经济政策制定的科学性。

definition: to inform/to report/to make known/report/speech/talk/lecture/CL:篇[pian1],份[fen4],個|个[ge4],通[tong4]
to come and see/to see a topic from a certain point of view
